mapper.delete: delete from lemon_volador_growthclass_stage where growthclass_id = #{class_id} and growthstage_id = #{stage_id}
mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM lemon_volador_growthstage t LEFT JOIN lemon_volador_growthclass_stage c_t ON t.id = c_t.growthstage_id LEFT JOIN lemon_volador_growthclass c ON c.id = c_t.growthclass_id WHERE c.id = #{id}

SELECT t.* FROM lemon_volador_growthclass t LEFT JOIN lemon_volador_growthclass_stage c_t ON t.id = c_t.growthclass_id LEFT JOIN lemon_volador_growthstage c ON c.id = c_t.growthstage_id WHERE c.id = #{id}

SELECT t.* FROM lemon_volador_growthclass t LEFT JOIN lemon_volador_personal_collect_growthclass c_t ON t.id = c_t.growthclass_id LEFT JOIN lemon_volador_personal_user c ON c.id = c_t.user_id WHERE c.id = #{id}

SELECT t.* FROM lemon_volador_course_chapter t LEFT JOIN lemon_volador_personal_collect_growthclass c_t ON t.id = c_t.chapter_id LEFT JOIN lemon_volador_personal_user u ON u.id = c_t.user_id LEFT JOIN lemon_volador_growthclass g ON g.id = c_t.growthclass_id WHERE u.id = #{user_id} and g.id = #{growthclass_id}
